channel.title: Console on 泥土巢
channel.description: Recent content in Console on 泥土巢

item.title: jstack命令
item.description: Java程序在操作系统上是以单进程、多线程的形式运行。 [work@zc-stage1-miui-sec02 ~]$ jstack Usage: jstack [-l] <pid> (to connect to running process) jstack -F [-m] [-l] <pid> (to connect to a hung process) jstack [-m] [-l] <executable> <core> (to connect to a core file) jstack [-m] [-l] [server_id@]<remote server IP or hostname> (to connect to a remote debug server) Options: -F to force a thread dump. Use when jstack <pid> does not respond (process is hung) -m to print both java and native frames (mixed mode) -l long listing.
